text: Anna Shaffer is an English actress, best known for her role as Ruby Button in teen soap opera Hollyoaks, and for her role as Romilda Vane in the Harry Potter film series. ==Filmography== ===Film=== Year Title Role Notes 2009 Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince Romilda Vane Film Adaptation 2010 Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1 Romilda Vane Film Adaptation 2011 Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2 Romilda Vane Film Adaptation ===Television=== Year Title Role Notes 2011-present Hollyoaks Ruby Button Regular cast First appearance: 3 January 2011 ===Music videos=== Year Title Notes 2012 YDEK by Warehouse Republic Girl ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Living people Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:1992 births Category:Actors from London
title: Anna Shaffer
